checktypes.name: vulcan-aws-alerts
checktypes.description: Detects general issues for an AWS account

checktypes.name: vulcan-aws-trusted-advisor
checktypes.description: Runs an AWS Trusted Advisor check against an AWS account

checktypes.name: vulcan-blast-radius
checktypes.description: Calculates the blast radius of an asset.

checktypes.name: vulcan-burp
checktypes.description: Runs a Burp Suite Enterprise Edition scan.

checktypes.name: vulcan-dmarc
checktypes.description: Checks if a domain have valid DNS configuration for DMARC

checktypes.name: vulcan-drupal
checktypes.description: Checks for some vulnerable versions of Drupal.

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-bgp
checktypes.description: Checks for exposed BGP port on Internet routers

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-db
checktypes.description: Checks if an asset has database well known ports open

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-http
checktypes.description: Checks if an asset has HTTP well known ports open

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-memcached
checktypes.description: Checks if the asset contains an exposed Memcached server

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-router-ports
checktypes.description: Checks if an asset has routers well known ports open.

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-services
checktypes.description: Checks if a host has any open ports by scanning the 1000 most common TCP and UDP ports

checktypes.name: vulcan-exposed-ssh
checktypes.description: Checks SSH server configuration for compliance with Mozilla OpenSSH guidelines

checktypes.name: vulcan-github-alerts
checktypes.description: Retrieves existing vulnerability alerts for a Github repository

checktypes.name: vulcan-gitleaks
checktypes.description: Finds potential secrets in source code from a Git repository using gitleaks

checktypes.name: vulcan-heartbleed
checktypes.description: Checks if an asset is vulnerable to Heartbleed

checktypes.name: vulcan-host-discovery
checktypes.description: Performs a quick Nmap ping scan that identifies which hosts are up

checktypes.name: vulcan-http-headers
checktypes.description: Analyzes the HTTP headers using Mozilla Observatory

checktypes.name: vulcan-ipv6
checktypes.description: Checks for IPv6 presence

checktypes.name: vulcan-masscan
checktypes.description: Checks if a host has any open port by scanning the whole TCP port range using masscan

checktypes.name: vulcan-mx
checktypes.description: Checks for MX DNS Records

checktypes.name: vulcan-nessus
checktypes.description: Runs a Nessus scan

checktypes.name: vulcan-nuclei
checktypes.description: Scan web addresses with projectdiscovery/nuclei

checktypes.name: vulcan-prowler
checktypes.description: Runs Prowler against an AWS account

checktypes.name: vulcan-results-load-test
checktypes.description: Check for testing performance when a check generates a lot of data

checktypes.name: vulcan-retirejs
checktypes.description: Check web pages for vulnerable JavaScript libraries

checktypes.name: vulcan-semgrep
checktypes.description: Finds potential issues in source code from a Git repository using Semgrep

checktypes.name: vulcan-sleep
checktypes.description: Check for testing timeout functionality

checktypes.name: vulcan-smtp-open-relay
checktypes.description: Check for testing SMTP Open Relay

checktypes.name: vulcan-spf
checktypes.description: Checks if a domain has a SPF record on DNS

checktypes.name: vulcan-tenable
checktypes.description: Retrieves findings from assets scanned by Tenable.io

checktypes.name: vulcan-trivy
checktypes.description: Scan docker images and Git repositories using aquasec/trivy

checktypes.name: vulcan-unclassified
checktypes.description: Raises an unclassified vulnerability for testing purposes

checktypes.name: vulcan-vulners
checktypes.description: Runs the nmap-script vulners against the target opened ports

checktypes.name: vulcan-wpscan
checktypes.description: Runs Wordpress scan

checktypes.name: vulcan-zap
checktypes.description: Runs an OWASP ZAP passive or active scan
